name: Zombie Siege 7.4.0
description:
This is my first game, you can download it for free, or buy it to support me and speed up the release of the Zombie Siege 3D game, which will have a story and more than 30 levels

+=============================================================+

The Zombie Siege game is a top-down zombie shooter. 

The game has several modes - arcade and levels. 

In arcade mode, a variety of zombies are coming at you,

which you need to kill by knocking out 

their weapons.

To complete the game in arcade mode, you need to kill 100 zombies, but it will 

not be so easy

, because there will be various difficult and not very bosses on your way.

After killing 100 zombies, a battle with the main boss will take place.

The game also has 

difficulty levels, by default they are simple, but if you want to test yourself

, you can put a 

difficult one.

 In the level mode, you need to go through a maze consisting of rooms, parallel cleaning it of zombies.

In this mode, weapons can be knocked out both from zombies and by breaking special boxes with 

weapons.(There are 5 very big levels in the game).
